definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Similar balls are in the jungles of Costa-Rica.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加的丛林里也有类似的东西。

sentences.english: Costa Rica plans to go carbon neutral by 2021.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加计划到2021年实现碳中和。

sentences.english: Water ripples resemble an impressionist painting in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加的层层水波，颇似印象派绘画。

sentences.english: Here, a female floats through a cloud forest in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 这里，一只雌性的彩车通过云层森林在哥斯达黎加。

sentences.english: These wasps live in a cloud forest in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 这类黄蜂居住在哥斯达黎加的雾林中。

sentences.english: Costa Rica, Belize, Nicaragua, Bermuda, the Bahamas, Tobago, Sam Guan.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加伯里兹尼加拉瓜百慕大巴哈马多巴哥？

sentences.english: It is only 90 kilometers away from the capital of Costa Rica, San Jose.
sentences.chinese: 那里距离哥斯达黎加首府圣荷西只有九十公里远。

sentences.english: The colón was introduced in 1896, replacing the Costa Rican peso.
sentences.chinese: 科郎于1896年开始采用，代替哥斯达黎加比索。

sentences.english: Punta Uva is a small town on the coast of Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 曼萨尼约是哥斯达黎加海岸边的一个小镇。

sentences.english: Using this system, Costa Rica again easily tops the list.
sentences.chinese: 使用这个方法，哥斯达黎加再次轻而易举地登顶。

sentences.english: Girl: I went bungee jumping in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 我去过哥斯达黎加蹦极。
